YNCTelemetryFlightMode

enum YNCTelemetryFlightMode : NSInteger {}

Data type for the different flight modes.

  • YNCREADY

    Ready mode

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    YNCREADY = 0
  • YNCTAKEOFF

    Takeoff mode

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    YNCTAKEOFF
  • YNCHOLD

    Hold mode

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    YNCHOLD
  • YNCMISSION

    Mission mode

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    YNCMISSION
  • YNCRETURN_TO_LAUNCH

    Return-to-home mode

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    YNCRETURN_TO_LAUNCH
  • YNCLAND

    Return-to-land mode

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    YNCLAND
  • YNCOFFBOARD

    Offboard mode

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    YNCOFFBOARD
  • YNCUNKNOWN

    Unknown flight mode

    Declaration

    Objective-C

    YNCUNKNOWN
